item.title: [snc] "Scheming Accomplice"
item.description:
Creature — Human Citizen

As "Scheming Accomplice" enters the battlefield, choose a nonland permanent.

Activated abilities of the chosen permanent can't be activated.

"Scheming Accomplice" has all activated abilities of the chosen permanent except loyalty abilities. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to activate them.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1ydLzF6QGbs

item.description:

item.title: [snc] "Uptown Pegasus"
item.description:
Creature — Pegasus

Flying, trample

item.title: [snc] "Top... Men"
item.description:
Artifact

Lands you control have "{T}: Create a Treasure token."

item.title: [snc] Venom Connoisseur
item.description:
Creature — Human Druid

Alliance — Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Venom Connoisseur gains deathtouch until end of turn. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, all creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn.

item.title: [snc] Unlicensed Hearse
item.description:
Artifact — Vehicle

{T}: Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard.

Unlicensed Hearse's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards exiled with it.

Crew 2

item.title: [snc] Aven Heartstabber
item.description:
Creature — Bird Assassin

Flying

As long as there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard, Aven Heartstabber gets +2/+2 and has deathtouch.

When Aven Heartstabber dies, mill two cards, then draw a card.

item.title: [snc] Unleash the Inferno
item.description:
Instant

Unleash the Inferno deals 7 damage to target creature or planeswalker. When it deals excess damage this way, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls with mana value less than or equal to that amount of excess damage.

https://twitter.com/MTG_Arena/status/1513608077102227460

item.title: [snc] Shakedown Heavy
item.description:
Creature — Ogre Warrior

Menace

Whenever Shakedown Heavy attacks, defending player may have you draw a card. If they do, untap Shakedown Heavy and remove it from combat.

https://twitter.com/malternativ/status/1513458321348612098

item.title: [snc] Obscura Interceptor
item.description:
Creature — Cephalid Wizard

Flash

Lifelink

When Obscura Interceptor enters the battlefield, it connives. When it connives this way, return up to one target spell to its owner's hand. (To have a creature connive, draw a card, then discard a card. Put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each nonland card discarded this way.)

https://twitter.com/Marshall_LR/status/1513443204351225862

item.title: [snc] Sizzling Soloist
item.description:
Creature — Human Citizen

Alliance — Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, that creature attacks during its controller's next combat phase if able.

https://twitter.com/CedricAPhillips/status/1513924917426720769

item.title: [snc] Extraction Specialist
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

Lifelink

When Extraction Specialist enters the battlefield, return target creature with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature can't attack or block for as long as you control Extraction Specialist.

item.title: [snc] Body Launderer
item.description:
Creature — Ogre Rogue

Deathtouch

Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, Body Launderer connives.

When Body Launderer dies, return another target non-Rogue creature card with equal to lesser power from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.description:
Land

Other Citizens you control get +1/+0.

item.title: [gdy] Skyclave Apparition
item.description:
Creature — Kor Spirit

When Skyclave Apparition enters the battlefield, exile up to one target nonland, nontoken permanent you don't control with mana value 4 or less.

When Skyclave Apparition leaves the battlefield, the exiled card's owner creates an X/X blue Illusion creature token, where X is the mana value of the exiled card.

item.title: [gdy] Power Word Kill
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target non-Angel, non-Demon, non-Devil, non-Dragon creature.

item.title: [snc] "Sleep with the Fishes"
item.description:
Enchantment

Enchant creature

When "Sleep with the Fishes" enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature and create a 1/1 blue Fish creature token with "This creature is unblockable."

Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

item.title: [snc] Rabble Rousing
item.description:
Enchantment

Hideaway 5 (When this enchantment enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

Whenever you attack with one or more creatures, create that many 1/1 green and white Citizen creature tokens. Then if you control ten or more creatures, you may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost.

item.title: [snc] Knockout Blow
item.description:
Instant

This spell costs {2} less to cast if it target a red creature.

Knockout Blow deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature and you gain 2 life.

https://youtu.be/Zd8QqlqDiUM

item.title: [snc] Shadow of Mortality
item.description:
Creature — Avatar

If your life total is less than your starting life total, this spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the difference.

item.title: [snc] Cabaretti Ascendency
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature or planeswalker card, you may reveal it and put it in your hand. If you don't, you may put it on the bottom of your library.

item.title: [snc] Rakish Revelers
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid Rogue

When Rakish Revelers enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.

{2}, Exile Rakish Revelers from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}" until Rakish Revelers is cast from exile. You may cast Rakish Revelers for as long as it remains exiled.
